channel.title: CamHD Video Analysis
channel.description: Recent content on CamHD Video Analysis

item.title: Running a local copy of lazycache
item.description: In most cases, if you’re making heavy use of Lazycache, it makes sense to run a local copy. Lazycache is packaged as a Docker image. Assuming you have Docker installed, you can run a local copy from the command line as: docker run --rm -p 8080:8080 amarburg/camhd_cache:latest This will expose your local copy at port 8080. You can then pass this local URL to the pycamhd-lazycache Python module: import pycamhd.
